document_data.caption: A redwing approaching [[Skyclave]].
document_data.name: Redwing
document_data.mainbody: A '''redwing''' was a huge [[dragonfly]]-like creature bred in [[High Imaskar]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were used to transport both trade goods and passengers on massive gondolas strapped to their undersides.
document_data.History:
Redwings were bred to facilitate trade

As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the [[Vengeance Riders]] kept specially trained redwings stabled on great balconies near the tip of the tower-city of [[Skyclave]]. At least four of these redwings were always on patrol around the tower on the lookout for threats.
